meanings.definition: The branch of economics that deals with the performance, structure, behavior, and decision-making of an economy as a whole.
meanings.sent1: In macroeconomics, we analyze how the entire economy functions.
meanings.sent2: Studying macroeconomics helps us understand how the economy as a whole behaves.
meanings.sent3: The professor made learning about macroeconomics surprisingly fun.
meanings.sent4: To grasp macroeconomics, imagine the economy as a giant puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on macroeconomics made the complex concepts easier to comprehend.

meanings.definition: The study of the behavior of the aggregate economy.
meanings.sent1: Understanding macroeconomics involves observing how the entire economy acts.
meanings.sent2: Economists use macroeconomics to analyze the overall economic behavior.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character tried to learn macroeconomics but got confused by the graphs.
meanings.sent4: Macroecomonics is like looking at a painting from afar to see the big picture.
meanings.sent5: The simulation game taught students macroeconomics through interactive scenarios.
